text: Mr. Harold Wilson, Shadow Chancellor, jumped up to offer the Government an easy passage for such legislation. "why don't you make proposals to legislate in the autumn?'Mr. Wilson asked. "We wouldn't call it an Autumn Budget. You can call it a Taxation Management Bill, if you like." While Mr. Wilson was speaking, the Prime Minister and Mr. Lloyd had a whispered conversation.

"why don't you make proposals to legislate in the autumn?'Mr. Wilson asked. "We wouldn't call it an Autumn Budget. You can call it a Taxation Management Bill, if you like." While Mr. Wilson was speaking, the Prime Minister and Mr. Lloyd had a whispered conversation.
